bioAsHtml: Johan is working as a Java lead developer / architect, Java trainer and Java Competence Center lead at Info Support. He has been working for various demanding companies where rapidly delivering quality software was very important. Currently he is working in a DevOps team in a big financial institution in The Netherlands. He likes sharing his knowledge about Java, Continuous Delivery, DevOps, software quality and numerous other subjects.

acceptedTalks.title: REST no more, use an actor (and Lego and Raspberry Pi’s…)
